note: The total fertility rate is the number of children that would be born to a woman if she were to live to the end of her child-bearing years and give birth to children at the current age-specific fertility rates.
title: Maternal mortality ratio vs. children per woman
subtitle: Maternal mortality ratio is the number of women who die from pregnancy-related causes while pregnant or within 42 days of pregnancy termination per 100,000 live births.
sourceDesc: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
